com.dhemery.polling

Interface Ticker

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SystemClockTicker

    public interface Ticker
    Marks time in fixed-size intervals called "ticks" and expires at some instant after starting. Ticks are reckoned from the instant the ticker is started. Tick size is determined by the implementation. The expiration time is determined by the implementation.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isExpired()
      Report whether the ticker is expired.
      void start()
      Start the ticker.
      void tick()
      Put this thread to sleep until the next tick.

    • Method Detail
